thread.section_title: Envision Video Services Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Envision Video Services | envisionvideoservices.com
thread.title: Dubdutch
thread.title_full: Envision Video Services reviewed by Dubdutch

author: Dubdutch
title: Dubdutch
text: I came to Envision to transfer 8mm film from the 50&60's and they also added a soundtrack as well.This DVD will be passed on to future generations and some are envious because we where able to preserve these priceless times.I will definitely return to transfer photos to disk or memory stick.Very good service.
